description: The authorDetails object contains basic details about the user that posted this message.

isChatModerator.description: Whether the author is a moderator of the live chat.

isChatOwner.description: Whether the author is the owner of the live chat.

isChatSponsor.description: Whether the author is a sponsor of the live chat.

isVerified.description: Whether the author's identity has been verified by YouTube.
